com.goinstant.auth

Class PlainUser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.goinstant.auth.PlainUser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    User

    public class PlainUser
extends Object
implements User
    A Plain User implementation. Fields have protected visibility to allow easy subclassing.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Map<String,Object> custom
      Map of custom properties this User/Group has (or null).
      protected String displayName
      Name to show for this User/Group.
      protected String domain
      Domain of this user.
      protected Set<Group> groups
      Groups this user belongs to (or null).
      protected String id
      Permanent, unique identifier for this User/Group.
      static Map<String,Object> NO_CUSTOM
      Empty map of custom claims.
      static Set<Group> NO_GROUPS
      Empty set of Groups.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlainUser(String id, String domain)
      Create a plain-old-User object.

      Create a plain-old-User object.

      Create a plain-old-User object.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,Object> getCustomClaims()
      Get custom claims made about this user or group.

      Get the visible name for this user or group (or the ID, if no name is set).
      String getDomain()
      Get the domain of this user and its groups.

      Get the groups this user belongs to.

      Get the permanent identifier for this user or group.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlainUser

        public PlainUser(String id,
         String domain,
         String displayName,
         Set<Group> groups)
        Create a plain-old-User object.
        Parameters:
        id - Permanent identifier for this user.
        domain - The domain name in which the user and group IDs are defined.
        displayName - The visible name for this user (null OK).
        groups - groups this user belongs to (null OK).

      • PlainUser

        public PlainUser(String id,
         String domain,
         String displayName)
        Create a plain-old-User object.
        Parameters:
        id - Permanent identifier for this user.
        domain - The domain name in which the user and group IDs are defined.
        displayName - The visible name for this user (null OK).

      • PlainUser

        public PlainUser(String id,
         String domain)
        Create a plain-old-User object. The displayName for this user will be set to the provided id.
        Parameters:
        id - Permanent identifier for this user.
        domain - The domain name in which the user and group IDs are defined.

    • Method Detail

      • getDomain

        public String getDomain()
        Get the domain of this user and its groups.
        Specified by:
        getDomain in interface User

      • getGroups

        public Set<Group> getGroups()
        Get the groups this user belongs to. Can be empty-set, but always non-null.
        Specified by:
        getGroups in interface User

      • getID

        public String getID()
        Get the permanent identifier for this user or group.

      • getDisplayName

        public String getDisplayName()
        Get the visible name for this user or group (or the ID, if no name is set).

      • setCustomClaims

        public void setCustomClaims(Map<String,Object> custom)
        Assign custom claims about this user or group.
        Parameters:
        custom - any custom claims. Pass null to remove all claims.

      • getCustomClaims

        public Map<String,Object> getCustomClaims()
        Get custom claims made about this user or group. Returns an empty set by default.
        Returns:
        custom claims about this user
